titleStmt.title: Balaams asse cudgeld: or The cry of town and countrey against scandalous and seditious scriblers.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "What ailes the asse? How comes the Beast to whine? ..."
Cf. Wing C1814 which has title word "ass".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
